overview:
John leads the charge in building strategic partnerships which drive traffic and revenue through search engines, shopping engines and technology companies focusing on an increasingly mobile world. John brings over 16 years experience in building successful companies. Prior to joining NearbyNow, John lead the west coast business development for Zix Corporation (SaaS company) and was instrumental in closing significant OEM deals and strategic alliances for Entrust. Earlier in his career, he built high growth partner programs focused on mobile users for SkyTel, drove significant revenue as a Product Manager at Qualix (acquired by Legato) and managed Fortune 500 customer accounts at Silicon Graphics.

John holds a B.A. in International Economics from UCLA and an M.B.A. from UCLA Anderson School of Management.
